  • Package gui

    • Class gui.MainFrame

      class MainFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • controller
          MainController controller
          controller managing user interactions
        • scrollPane
          JScrollPane scrollPane
          scroll pane containing the text area
        • splitPane
          ResizableSplitPane splitPane
          split pane containing tabbed pane and text area -> is placed in CENTER
        • statusLabel
          JLabel statusLabel
          status label -> is placed in SOUTH
        • tabbedPane
          JTabbedPane tabbedPane
          tabbed pane containing graphs
        • textArea
          JTextArea textArea
          text area where text can be printed to
        • toolbar
          PetrinetToolbar toolbar
          toolbar -> is placed in NORTH

      1L

    • Class gui.PetrinetPanel

      class PetrinetPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • adjustArrowHeads
          boolean adjustArrowHeads
          Keep track whether arrow head should be adjusted -> takes time which accumulates when doing multiple tasks in quick succession (e.g. when analyzing a petrinet)
        • editor
          PetrinetEditorController editor
          controller managing changes to the petrinet
        • firstTimeArrowHeadAdjusting
          boolean firstTimeArrowHeadAdjusting
          keeping track whether it is the first time adjusting the arrow heads since there are problems adjusting them the first time after creating the view panel for some reason
        • graphSplitPane
          ResizableSplitPane graphSplitPane
          split pane holding petrinet and reachability graph
        • mainController
          MainController mainController
          controller managing the interaction with toolbar and menu
        • petrinetController
          PetrinetViewerController petrinetController
          controller managing the interaction with the data model
        • petrinetGraph
          GraphStreamPetrinetGraph petrinetGraph
        • petrinetPanel
          JPanel petrinetPanel
          panel for the petrinet -> if the view panel for the GraphStream graph is not put inside another panel the layout is unstable
        • petrinetViewPanel
          org.graphstream.ui.swing_viewer.ViewPanel petrinetViewPanel
          view panel holding the viewer for the GraphStream graph
        • reachabilityGraph
          GraphStreamReachabilityGraph reachabilityGraph
        • reachabilityPanel
          JPanel reachabilityPanel
          panel for the reachability graph -> if the view panel for the GraphStream graph is not put inside another panel the layout is unstable
        • reachabilityViewPanel
          org.graphstream.ui.swing_viewer.ViewPanel reachabilityViewPanel
          view panel holding the viewer for the GraphStream graph
        • toolbarMode
          ToolbarMode toolbarMode
          Toolbar mode (EDITOR / VIEWER) the panel is in. By default set to VIEWER.

    • Class gui.PetrinetToolbar

      class PetrinetToolbar extends JToolBar implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • addEdgeButton
          ToolbarButton addEdgeButton
          add a new edge to the petrinet -> is highlighted while adding and is reset when the adding process is done
        • addLabelButton
          JButton addLabelButton
          add a label to an element -> is highlighted while removing and is reset when the adding process is done
        • addPlaceButton
          JButton addPlaceButton
          add a new place to the petrinet
        • addTransitionButton
          JButton addTransitionButton
          add new transition to the petrinet
        • analyseButton
          JButton analyseButton
          button to start analysis of the current petrinet
        • buttonDefaultColor
          Color buttonDefaultColor
          keep track of default button color of look and feel so it can be highlighted and changed back
        • buttonHighlightColor
          Color buttonHighlightColor
          default highlight color
        • changeLookAndFeelButton
          JButton changeLookAndFeelButton
        • clearTextButton
          JButton clearTextButton
          clear the text area in the main frame
        • closeEditorButton
          JButton closeEditorButton
          close the editor
        • deleteComponentButton
          JButton deleteComponentButton
          delete marked component
        • dockingPlace
          String dockingPlace
          keeps track of the place in the BorderLayout of the main frame where the toolbar is docked to
        • openEditorButton
          JButton openEditorButton
          open the editro
        • redoButton
          ToolbarButton redoButton
          redo last step -> is highlighted when there are steps to redo
        • removeEdgeButton
          ToolbarButton removeEdgeButton
          remove an edge from the petrinet
        • resetButton
          JButton resetButton
          reset the reachability graph (and therefore the petrinet)
        • restartButton
          JButton restartButton
          set petrinet to initial markings
        • toggleAutoLayoutButton
          ToolbarButton toggleAutoLayoutButton
          choose auto layout for reachability graph
        • toggleCircleLayoutButton
          ToolbarButton toggleCircleLayoutButton
          choose circle layout for reachability graph
        • toggleTreeLayoutButton
          ToolbarButton toggleTreeLayoutButton
          choose tree layout for reachability graph
        • undoButton
          ToolbarButton undoButton
          undo last step -> is highlighted when there are steps to undo
        • zoomInReachabilityButton
          JButton zoomInReachabilityButton
          zoom into the reachability graph
        • zoomOutReachabilityButton
          JButton zoomOutReachabilityButton
          zoom out of the reachability graph

      class ResizableSplitPane extends JSplitPane implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • dividerRatio
          double dividerRatio
          ratio of the divider -> is updated when divider is moved
        • parent
          MainFrame parent
          the parent container
        • toolbarOffSet
          int toolbarOffSet
          offset that is considered when toolbar is docked to EAST or WEST of parent
